Title: Automation Technician
Location: Lot A, My Phuoc Industrial Park, My Phuoc Ward, Ben Cat Town, Binh Duong., 9th floor, Agrex Building, 58 Vo Van Tan Street, District 3, HCMC
Job Description:
I. Main Purpose or Function of Position
• Ensure safety first and no quality affected for maintenance work
• Ensure to implement Maintenance Work order
• Suggest solution, review maintenance task to enhance maintenance effectively
• Focus maintenance critical equipment
• Write standard work instruction/OPL/SOP as output cycle SDCA
• Coaching, guide Operator implement autonomous maintenance
• Prepare, review and analyze quantity spare part for maintenance work
• Apply predictive maintenance by the thermal camera and vibration ultrasonic
• Make sure the automation and control system as VO standard
• Ensure high-reliability equipment by analyzing root cause, take preventive action precisely

II. Main Accountabilities
• Make risk assessment, checklist, SAM, LOTO, PPE and work permit for maintenance work and contractor as regulation
• Complete work order as planned, input corrective work, and breakdown with right failure code to SAP enough
• Update PI daily in team room, update status WO at maintenance board at the work place
• Report weekly from SAP
• Join to build and update RCM continuously, make OWD RCM, SWI, SOP to eliminate task list unnecessarily
• Assessment critical equipment, focus maintenance category A/B equipment prepare : spare parts, SWI, tool, calibration, preventive maintenance, predictive maintenance, clean-inspection and lubrication.
• Write and update SWI, OPL, SOP as output problem solving and cycle SDCA
• Support and coaching Operator to implement autonomous maintenance
• Analyzing the spare parts to review min/max. Preparing spare parts for A/B equipment. Tracking external repair on time. Recommend to buy special part
• Do predictive maintenance by using thermal cameras and SDT ultrasonic
• Report result of measurement and find opportunity saving dollar
• Automation and control have wire-draw onsite and soft file, have work order maintain, SWI backup.
• Backup fully, do calibration as plan, tracking and update C&A alarm monitoring at the workplace
• Tracking and complete analysis 5Why 100% on quality
• Engineering support: Do as request from line manager
+ Recommend technical improvement for efficiency equipment operation
+ Contribute improvement solution, automation procedure to assure equipment and machine operate effectively, quality and save cost.
+ Take part and set up parameters for new product development
+ Co-ordinating and support other members in the team
Job Requirements:
Education
• At least College degree (Bachelor is preferred), major in Automation, Electrical & Electronic
Industry Experiences
• Experienced in Manufacturing industry, especially Food & Beverage (F&B) industry
• Beer industry is a plus
Position Experiences
• Over 2 years related work experience in Automation/Maintenance Technician or Engineer.

Language
• English: Good reading and writing skills (English communication is a plus)
Computer
• Expertise in MS Office
• PLC/HMI programming Siemens, knowledge about instrument as temperature, pressure, flow….
• SQL and PowerBI are preferred.
Knowledge/ Skills
• Safety operation knowledge
• Basic technical knowledge
• Knowledge about brewing process
• Know Root Cause Analysis (RCA), KPI Target Setting
• Know VPO, 5S, Supply Excellence; Autonomous Maintenance
• Know food safety policy of ABI, HACCP and Quality management
Others requirement:
• Good health, be able to work long hours
• Teamwork, integrity/honesty
• Ability working under pressure

Title: Group Finance Manager
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam, HCMC
Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Tax & Regulatory Compliance
• Lead and manage all matters related to tax inspection, audits, and compliance in Vietnam.
• Ensure accurate and timely filing of corporate taxes, VAT, and other statutory obligations.
• Maintain strong relationships with the Tax Department and proactively handle any tax-related disputes or clarifications.
International Financial Transactions
• Manage processes for remittance of funds overseas, including dividends to overseas shareholders and repayment of inter-company or external loans.
• Ensure full compliance with Vietnamese foreign exchange control regulations and corporate governance requirements for fund movements.
• Coordinate and liaise with the State Bank of Vietnam (SBV) for foreign loan registration, approvals, and compliance filings.
Corporate Finance & Administration
• Oversee and maintain company holding structures, ensuring proper documentation, reporting, and alignment with group strategies.
• Provide support for group consolidation, forecasting, budgeting, and financial reporting.
• Manage all company administration matters, including updates to corporate registry, board resolutions, capital changes, and compliance filings.
Banking & Treasury
• Manage local bank relationships for operations, funding, payments, and documentation requirements.
• Support applications for new loans, bank guarantees, and credit facilities, and ensure proper documentation is maintained for all financial agreements.
• Monitor and manage cash flow, inter-company fund transfers, and treasury functions efficiently.
Operational Support
• Work closely/train hotel finance teams to ensure alignment with group reporting standards.
• Support real estate development finance, including project feasibility analysis, financing structure, and compliance.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting, Finance, or a related field. Professional certifications (CPA, ACCA, CFA) are an advantage.
• Minimum 7–10 years of relevant experience, ideally in a multinational company, Big 4 accounting firm, or group finance role.
• Strong understanding of Vietnam tax laws, foreign exchange regulations, and corporate structuring.
• Experience dealing with State Bank of Vietnam, local tax authorities, and Vietnamese commercial banks.
• Familiarity with remittance of profits, loan repayments, and cross-border compliance in a group structure.
• Excellent command of English and Vietnamese (spoken and written).
• High level of integrity, problem-solving abilities, and attention to detail.

Title: Giám Đốc Kinh Doanh
Company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN ĐẦU TƯ VÀ THƯƠNG MẠI MITICO
Location: Tòa Home City, số 177 phố Trung Kính, Phường Yên Hòa, Thành Phố Hà Nội, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Mô tả chi tiết công việc của Giám đốc kinh doanh Mật Ong JaHoney
1. Xây dựng và thực hiện chiến lược kinh doanh:
• Nghiên cứu, phân tích thị trường mật ong cao cấp nhập khẩu, đối thủ cạnh tranh và xu hướng tiêu dùng để đưa ra các chiến lược kinh doanh phù hợp đối với thị trường Việt Nam và thị trường quốc tế.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch kinh doanh dài hạn và ngắn hạn theo tuần tháng, quý, năm và tổ chức thực hiện, bao gồm mục tiêu doanh số, thị phần, kênh phân phối, và các hoạt động Marketing.
• Xây dựng và triển khai thực hiện các chiến dịch Marketing tập trung vào giá trị của thương hiệu nổi tiếng và các lợi ích đặc biệt về sức khoẻ của mật ong Manuka và mật ong Jarrah.
• Xây dựng và quản lý ngân sách kinh doanh, đảm bảo sử dụng nguồn lực hiệu quả.
2. Quản lý và phát triển đội ngũ kinh doanh:
• Tuyển dụng, đào tạo, và phát triển đội ngũ nhân viên kinh doanh, thiết lập KPIs cá nhân/nhóm và đánh giá hiệu suất làm việc của nhân viên kinh doanh và đưa ra các yêu cầu cụ thể đảm bảo doanh số bán hàng đối với từng kênh bán hàng và từng khu vực thị trường.
• Xây dựng và duy trì một môi trường làm việc tích cực, năng động, và hiệu quả.
3. Phát triển thị trường và khách hàng:
• Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ tốt với các khách hàng, đối tác, và các kênh phân phối.
• Tìm kiếm và phát triển khách hàng tiềm năng, mở rộng thị trường và tăng doanh số bán hàng.
• Nghiên cứu và phát triển các sản phẩm dịch vụ mới cho JAHONEY phù hợp với nhu cầu thị trường.
• Tổ chức các sự kiện, chương trình khuyến mãi, quảng bá sản phẩm để tăng cường nhận diện thương hiệu JAHONEY và thúc đẩy doanh số.
4. Quản lý hoạt động bán hàng:
• Chịu trách nhiệm về doanh số, lợi nhuận và thị phần của JAHONEY theo Tháng, Quý, Năm. Tối ưu hoá doanh thu thông qua việc phát triển các kênh bán hàng (Quà tặng, đại lý, siêu thị, thương mại điện tử).
• Theo dõi, đánh giá kết quả kinh doanh, phân tích nguyên nhân và đưa ra các giải pháp khắc phục kịp thời.
• Xây dựng và trình ban hành các quy trình, quy định bán hàng của công ty đảm bảo khoa học, hiệu quả.
Job Requirements:
• Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên chuyên ngành kinh tế, quản trị kinh doanh, hoặc các ngành liên quan.

• Có kiến thức sâu rộng về thị trường mật ong cao cấp, sản phẩm thực phẩm cao cấp và các kênh phân phối.
• Có kỹ năng lãnh đạo, quản lý, và phát triển đội ngũ.
• Có kỹ năng giao tiếp, đàm phán, và thuyết trình tốt.
• Có khả năng phân tích, đánh giá, và giải quyết vấn đề.
• Có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao, chịu được áp lực công việc.
• Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm.
• Sử dụng thành thạo tiếng Anh (là một lợi thế).

Title: Customer Service & Order Management Lead
Location: Other, Vietcombank Tower, 18th & 19th floor, 05 Cong Truong Me Linh, Ben Nghe Ward
Job Description:
Key activities:
Order Management
• Coordinates the execution of order processing flow from acquisition to billing/cash.
• Order Acquisition: Increase automation of Order Acquisition (e.g. Promotion of electronic ordering methods)
• Order Validation: Logistics Trade Terms Compliance, alignment with credit control
• Order Delivery: Alignment with Logistics Team for peaks preparation & Planning team for out-of-stocks for NW
• Billing: Ensure billing consistency, price checking and compliance with Customs (for export)
• Cash: Ensure coordination with Account Receivables to ensure payment and act as escalation if needed
Customer Relationship Management
• Drive the Customer Relationship Management for their Customers:
• Supports to get to a robust Customer and Product data via right governance and alignment with Master Data experts
• Actively works to get one-source of E2E customer information together with Sales, Trade Marketing, Finance and CS&L.
• Uses and promotes usage of E2E customer information at any point of customer contact.
• Coordinate customer Queries, Incidents, Claims and Disputes by:
• Managing the process of capturing customer queries.
• Monitoring and evaluating the resolution process, with involvement of relevant stakeholders.
• Tracking and recording common customer complaints, and proactively acting upon to achieve claims reduction.
• Manage proactive communication to Customer
Customer Profitability & Negotiation with Customers
• Actively drives insights on Customer Profitability by:
• Monitoring Cost-2-Serve (C2S) per Customer
• Collaborating with Finance to integrate C2S in Customer P&L.
• Continuously improving C2S by coordinating business cases creation with customers
• Owns and manages the Logistics Trade Terms (LTT) agreements with Customers, while ensuring:
• Development of LTT agreements
• LTT agreements are measured, tracked, reviewed, and enforced
• Negotiates with customers from the perspective of logistics.
Customer Collaboration & joint value creation
• Gains top management sponsorship. Implements Joint Supply Chain Plan with Customers. Facilitates links between the right people in both companies.
• Forges strong personal relationships with key customers and supply management at all levels. Detects opportunities and implements Supply Chain collaboration initiatives with Customers aiming at joint value creation.
Management information Reporting
• Provides clear and accurate information on Customer Service performance via:
• Managing the reporting of service level agreements, costs and KPIs (internally and externally) (ex: Case Fill Rate, Cost to Serve, OSA…)
• Joint Scorecard with Customers
• Ensuring there are clear metrics across all KPIs
• Ensuring Root Cause Failure Analysis on KPIs
Organization and People management
• Actively drives a customer centric culture in the team and ensures cross-functional alignment.
• Effectively organizes and manages a team of people by:
• Having right team members and roles in-place
• Driving an aligned and focused culture through clear performance targets and regular one-on-ones
• Implementing personal development programme including competencies development
• Lead and/or contributes to cross-functional projects on a need basis
• Actively shares with other OpCos and contributes to Global CS capabilities and CS community on a need basis
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s or Higher Degree in Business Administration or relevant fields
• At least 3 years of experiences in similar roles in FMCG
Knowledge
• Strong E2E Supply Chain knowledge, Financial and Commercial understanding
• Experiences of working directly with Customers
• Experiences in Order Management (Stock Allocation, Sales Volume Tracking, etc.)
• Experiences in System Management (ERP, Order Management System)
• Knowledge in Logistics Delivery Process
Skills
• Ability to effectively collaborate across functions
• Strong people and team management
• Problem solving & presentation skills
• Strong project management skills
• Excellent negotiation & customer relationship management skills with evidence of being able to influence key decision makers
• Strong proficiency in both written and spoken Vietnamese and English
• Data Analysis skill (Proficient with Excel, PowerBI, reporting, dashboard, etc.)
• English proficiency: Advanced

Title: Human Resources Manager
Location: Opal Tower 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, HCMC, Opal Tower Building, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh city
Job Description:
Netcompany was founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from over 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in public and private sectors across Europe.

We are looking for a skillful HR Manager to join our office in Vietnam with the local scale of +300 employees. You will manage our dedicated local HR team based in Ho Chi Minh City, with opportunities to expand your expertise while enjoying the benefits of being part of a European organization.

Top 3 Reasons to Join Us

International professional working environment
Clear career path with a strong academy system
Great benefits focused on human development and work life balance

Job description
As the HR Manager at Netcompany, you will play a crucial role in supervising the daily operations and management of our HR Team, which encompasses HR Administration, Talent Acquisition, and Employer Branding. This dynamic team handles a broad spectrum of responsibilities, including recruitment, onboarding and offboarding processes, training and development coordination, mobility initiatives, performance management, retention strategies, and promoting employee well-being.

In your capacity as the HR Team Manager, you will work closely with your team to effectively manage, optimize, and improve our HR functions and processes, ensuring the provision of high-quality service and support across all levels of the organization.

Your key responsibilities will involve:
• Management and coordination of the HR team, ensuring the ongoing professional development and well-being of its members.
• Contribution to the effective achievement of the HR team's objectives, with particular attention to compliance with applicable policies, deadlines, annual cycles, and emerging business needs.
• Collaboration with the company's stakeholders at various levels to ensure knowledge transfer.
• Promotion of best practices and optimization of the HR processes, ensuring compliance with applicable legislation.
• Implementation of the company's HR policy, including the management of recruitment processes and candidate selection.
• Representation of Netcompany in personnel matters.
• Oversight and management of the HR budget.
• Supervision of onboarding and offboarding processes for employees.
• Ensuring the effectiveness of Employer Branding (EB) processes and activities.
• Coordinating and planning employee training (both internal and external).
• Monitoring and reporting on HR-specific indicators (KPIs), and planning and implementing appropriate actions.
• Participation in meetings organized within the Netcompany Group, both in Vietnam and abroad.
Job Requirements:
• A Bachelor’s or Master’s degree, preferably in Human Resources or Law. Other relevant fields will also be considered.
• Full professional proficiency in English, both spoken and written.
• A minimum of 7 years of experience in HR, with solid knowledge of VN labor law.
• Proven experience in managing end-to-end recruitment processes.
• Demonstrated ability to directly manage, coach, and develop team members.
• Strong experience working within international organizations, including collaboration across global HR structures and talent processes.
• Good organization skills, strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
• Familiarity with the IT market is an advantage.
Field: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm
Keyword: Phần Mềm CNTT/Dịch vụ Phần mềm

Title: Giám Đốc Kinh Doanh TMĐT Ngành Hàng Thực Phẩm Bảo Vệ Sức Khoẻ, Nhập Khẩu Từ Cộng Hoà Pháp
Company: Công Ty TNHH Thương Mại - Dược Phẩm Mẹ và Bé
Location: số 5B ngõ 2 Phương Mai, Đống Đa, HN, Số 6 ngách 38 ngõ 15 phố Phương Mai, Phường Phương Mai, Quận Đống Đa, Hà Nội
Job Description:
Công ty TNHH Thương mại-Dược phẩm Mẹ và Bé là Nhà đăng ký, nhập khẩu trực tiếp và phân phối độc quyền tại thị trường Việt Nam và các nước Đông Nam Á, các mặt hàng Thực phẩm bảo vệ sức khỏe của Cộng hòa Pháp, với các thương hiệu nổi tiếng như Special Kid, Special Mum, Lactobacillus reuteri và rất nhiều mặt hàng khác trong tương lai gần.
- Với số lượng chủng loại và thương hiệu lớn và còn tiếp tục có nhiều hơn nữa, chúng tôi đang rất cần có thêm nhiều đối tác tốt để sát cánh cùng chúng tôi phát triển và mở rộng thị trường tại cả Việt Nam và Đông Nam Á.
- Chúng tôi đang cần tuyển dụng:
1. Vị trí:
• Tuyển dụng Giám đốc Kinh doanh TMĐT ngành hàng Thực phẩm bảo vệ sức khoẻ.
• Khu vực: Toàn quốc, văn phòng tại thành phố Hà Nội.
2. Trách nhiệm:
• Chịu trách nhiệm trực tiếp với Ban giám đốc về toàn bộ hoạt động marketing, bán hàng thông qua TMĐT, cũng như về doanh số được giao.
• Phối hợp với phòng HCNS, phòng Chuyên môn, phòng Marketing của Công ty tuyển dụng và đào tạo Nhân viên marketing, Nhân viên telesales, Nhân viên content, Nhân viên editor.....và tất cả các vị trí cần thiết khác phục vụ cho nhiệm vụ được giao.
• Xây dựng chính sách bán hàng cho từng đối tượng tương ứng...
• Giữ gìn và phát triển thương hiệu đã có.
• Nhiệm vụ quan trọng nhất là phải bán được hàng.
- Các bạn truy cập thật kỹ vào các trang web sau để có thông tin về sản phẩm:
www.specialkid.vn
www.specialmum.vn
Job Requirements:
- Độ tuổi từ 35 đến 45.
- Có ít nhất năm năm kinh nghiệm về các công việc liên quan đến TMĐT.
- Có ít nhất ba năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí Giám đốc Kinh doanh TMĐT (hoặc tương đương), ưu tiên ngành hàng Thực phẩm bảo vệ sức khoẻ nhập khẩu.
- Nộp hồ sơ xin việc bằng tiếng Việt (xin đừng thể hiện không chỗ).

Title: Director, Capability Development – Corporate Banking
Location: Techcombank HO, số 6 Quang Trung, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Head Office: 6 Quang Trung Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi
Job Description:
Job Purpose
The job holder is responsible for collaborating with stakeholders to build Overall Development Plan (ODP -including Capability construct and Learning roadmap); identify capability development needs, design and develop capability development solutions; plan, manage budget amd organize implementation of capability development solutions for frontline in order to fulfil requirements of the Division and Techcombank's strategy.

Key Accountabilities
Strategy and planning:
- Build capability development strategy to close the gap for frontline managers, sales force and support functions of Division
Business and operation management
1.1. Capability Development Management:
- Engage business stakeholders and partners to identify capability development needs, build and manage Overall Development Plan (including Capability Construct and Learning Roadmap) for all Retail frontline positions
- Manages impact assessment and readiness for initiatives/ other strategy changes related to the Overall Development Plan.(e.g:new products, new service model, changes in policies/ legal regulations, etc.). Manage change implementation.
- Build và manage planning, budget và financial management.
1.2. Capability development solution Design và Development:
- Define and validate learning objectives and outlines, learning assets, approach and evaluation parameters
- Create learning assets, leveraging standardized templates and asset development parameters for wide range of assets
- Managing Projects: Engages stakeholders to manage development of new (or revision of) learning asset(including managing vendors, if applicable
1.3. Capability development solution Implementation and Evaluation:
- Manage implementation of training/ facilitation/ coaching activities, as well as post-training evaluation model/process/ tools/ system

PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
- Oversee human resources planning and execution (headcount and costs) of their function/ sub- function
- Attract, onboard and retain the right talents for a high- performing team
- Establish and communicate sub- function/ function and individual KRAs/ KPIs, goals, action plan, expectations and results to reporting line

Title: Planning Financial Manager (Work location Cần Thơ)
Company: Công Ty TNHH Trung Sơn Alpha (Hệ Thống Nhà Thuốc Trung Sơn)
Location: 20 Mai Chí Thọ, KDC 586, Phú Thứ, Cái Răng, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam, Đ. Lê Thánh Tôn, Bến Nghé, Quận 1, Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, 90 Lý Tự Trọng, Phường An Cư, TP Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
Job Description:
Work location: Cần Thơ
-------------------------------
Job Summary:
We are seeking an exceptional Planning Finance Manager to join our leadership team, with a mandate to transform financial performance and operational effectiveness across our 250-store retail network. This role is ideal for a strategic, data-driven, and commercially sharp finance professional with a track record of driving EBITDA growth, gross profit improvement, cost optimization, and cross-functional alignment.
You will play a pivotal role in building a high-impact planning & performance management culture, leveraging advanced analytics, AI, and business intelligence (BI) dashboards to deliver actionable insights and operational improvements across key business areas including Supply Chain, Procurement, Pricing, Marketing, Store Profitability, and Region Performance.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Strategic Financial Planning & Performance Management
• Lead the Annual Operating Plan (AOP) process with full integration across Sales, Supply Chain, Marketing, and Operations.
• Develop and maintain a rolling forecast model to adapt to market dynamics and internal execution variances.
• Track actual performance against AOP and drive cross-functional accountability for target achievement.
2. Business Intelligence & Dashboard Management
• Design and manage a comprehensive set of daily, weekly, and monthly BI dashboards to monitor:
◦ Revenue trends, EBITDA performance
◦ Gross profit and margin mix
◦ Store and regional performance
◦ Purchase price fluctuation and supplier rebate tracking
◦ Near-expiry product movement and incentives
• Lead crisis-time dashboard reviews for fast decision-making under pressure.
3. Operational Efficiency & Cross-Functional Alignment
• Identify root causes behind EBITDA stagnation despite revenue growth; drive resolution through pricing, COGS, or store productivity initiatives.
• Work with Sales, SCM, and Category teams to drive 5% gross profit improvement through upselling, mix shift, and margin management.
• Drive AI initiatives that unlock 20% efficiency across operations and finance functions.
4. Store & Regional Profitability Management
• Proactively manage underperforming stores and regions; drive turnaround plans or propose rationalization with clear financial analysis.
• Provide in-depth support on negative EBITDA store analysis, build business cases for improvement or exit.
5. Procurement & Rebate Optimization
• Collaborate with Purchasing to control purchase price variances, optimize supplier rebates and volume-based tiers.
• Improve visibility and forecasting of back margin and vendor income recognition.
6. Supply Chain & Cost Efficiency Projects
• Lead cross-functional cost savings projects with a structured approach, targeting fragmented cost structures (logistics, packaging, operations).
• Support supply chain optimization, DC planning, inventory holding strategy, and shrinkage management.
7. Month-End Closing & Financial Accuracy
• Streamline month-end closing timelines, automate reconciliation processes, and ensure the accuracy of financial statements.
• Drive adoption of best practices in financial controls and compliance.
Job Requirements:
• Bachelor’s or Master’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, or related field; CPA/ACCA/CMA preferred.
• 8–12+ years of experience in financial planning & analysis, business control, or strategic finance in the retail or FMCG industry.
• Proven track record of leading cross-functional initiatives to drive profitability.
• Strong experience working with ERP, Power BI, and planning tools.
• Data-driven, structured thinking with the ability to present clearly to C-level stakeholders.
• Demonstrated success managing teams and collaborating across functions in high-growth, multi-site environments.

Title: Senior Human Resources Consultant
Location: Opal Tower 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, HCMC, Opal Tower Building, 92 Nguyen Huu Canh, Ward 22, Binh Thanh District, Ho Chi Minh city
Job Description:
Netcompany was founded in 2000 with the headquarters in Copenhagen, Denmark. Today, we are an international company with more than 8200 employees working from over 10 locations. We serve a wide array of customers in their digital transformation journeys in public and private sectors across Europe.

We are looking for a skillful Senior HR Consultant to join our office in Vietnam with the local scale of +300 employees. You will join our strong and dedicated HR team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to extend your skill and enjoy great benefit of European Company.

Top 3 Reasons to Join Us
- International professional working environment
- Clear career path with strong academy system
- Great benefits focus on human development and work life balance

Primary tasks, including:
- Monitor all HR’s systems/policies and work closely with the global team to keep them working effectively
- Timely update and review HR policies and procedures, handle tasks with labor authorities to ensure all company policies are well compliant with Vietnam labor law
- Address employees’ queries, explain clear policies and employee handbooks
- Associate with other divisions to support and manage employees, update staff profiles and organization chart
- Responsible for salary computation, attendance record/leave record for all employees accurately and timely
- In charge of all kinds of paperwork related to Human resources: salary approval, letter of offer, appendix, renewal contract confirmation, probation confirmation, labor contract and ensure the labor contract list is up to date. Prepare other kinds of paperwork such as job transfer, termination decision, promotion, employment reference check, etc.
- In charge of work permit, temporary residence card/ working visa, apartment for expats working in Vietnam
- Responsible for the onboarding and offboarding of expats as well as other tasks related to Global Mobility
- Supervise and be able to cover tasks regarding: Onboarding and offboarding
- Private health insurance program
- Employee Assistance Program and other programs offered as benefits to employees
- Employee occasional care
- Other duties as assigned by Head of HR

Your tasks can be expanded, including:
- Organize local and abroad - internal and external training courses
- Arrange travel/hotel bookings/visa applications for business trips
- Support the company's outings and events when needed
Job Requirements:
- At least 4-5 YOEs working in HR field with experience in the mentioned tasks
- Bachelor’s degree in related major
- Strong experience in collaboration with Global team
- Thorough knowledge of labor laws and practices
- Good command of English and Microsoft Office
- Familiar with the business scale from 300 to 500 employees
- Good communication, teamwork and interpersonal skills
- Must be approachable, supportive and helpful
- Good organization skills, strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills
- Soft skills in dealing with people, suppliers and authorities
- Be able to work with multi-tasking, respect deadlines

Vị trí Account Manager sẽ quản lý mối quan hệ với khách hàng, xây dựng và triển khai các kế hoạch marketing, bao gồm Digital Marketing Plan và IMC Plan, cũng như giám sát và đảm bảo các dự án được thực hiện đúng tiến độ và đạt kết quả mong muốn.

Nhiệm Vụ Chính:
• Quản lý khách hàng: Duy trì và phát triển mối quan hệ khách hàng, lắng nghe và chuyển tải yêu cầu đến các bộ phận liên quan.
• Xây dựng kế hoạch marketing: Phát triển Digital Marketing Plan và IMC Plan, tích hợp các chiến lược truyền thông online và offline.
• Quản lý dự án: Giám sát tiến độ và chất lượng thực hiện các chiến dịch marketing, đảm bảo đúng ngân sách và thời gian.
• Phân tích và báo cáo kết quả: Đánh giá hiệu quả chiến dịch, báo cáo kết quả và đề xuất giải pháp cải tiến.

• Hiểu biết về các công cụ digital marketing và truyền thông trực tuyến.

Phúc lợi:

Title: Director, Customer Value Management Corporate Banking
Location: Techcombank HO, số 6 Quang Trung, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Head Office: 6 Quang Trung Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi
Job Description:
Job Purpose
The Director, Customer Value Management (CVM) is responsible for managing the PnL and Customer LifetimeValue (CLV) of customer segments in alignment with the bank's strategic objectives. This role involvescoordinating planning activities, identifying opportunities and gaps within different portfolios, and collaboratingwith Business Finance (BF) and Data and Analytics (DnA) to optimize customer value.

Customer Value Management (CVM) for all Customer segments under the management of Division
• PnL management of customer segments in line with strategic objectives; coordinate business plandevelopment activities and select priority actions for each period to generate revenue and optimize costs,achieve target profit in line with the bank's strategy, and manage key impact indicators (drivers) by eachsegment to optimize customer lifetime value (CLV).
• Oversee the management of PnL and CLV for various customer segments to ensure alignment with thebank's strategic objectives. Develop and implement strategies to maximize revenue and cost-efficiency,achieving targeted profits by optimizing cost and enhancing the CLV of Customer Segment
• Coordinate planning activities and prioritize actions for each period to maximize customer value. Ensure thatall key drivers by segment are managed effectively.
• Identify opportunities and gaps (GAPs) of different categories to come up with success metrics; plan andidentify actions to be implemented through close coordination with the Business Analysis unit (BF - Finance)and the DnA Division.
• Collaborate with DnA Division on the development and implementation of Next Best Offer models. Ensurethe right offers are delivered to the right customers at the right time through the right channels.
• Manage the customer identification index/model for segments and sub-segments by providing requirementsto the DnA team.
• Coordinate with BF to develop customer dashboard performance management systems. Oversee campaignmanagement and relationship-based pricing strategies to enhance customer lifetime value.
• Utilize data analytics to drive insights and decisions that enhance customer value and profitability. Providedata-driven insights and recommendations to senior management for informed decision-making.
• Develop and refine customer segmentation models to improve targeting and personalization efforts.
• Work closely with various departments including marketing, product development, and customer service toensure cohesive strategies and initiatives.

Organizational cultural work
• Ensure management in Division under 3 principles: fairness, transparency and respect.
• Be an example in building and strengthening corporate culture.
• Make sure the correct and complete implementation of corporate culture plans; all employees understandand apply consistently corporate cultural values, behavioral standards.
• Perform other related tasks as requested by the line manager.

People management:
• Supervise the formulation and implementation of resource plans (allocation & costs) at the unit.
• Attract, receive and retain talent in accordance with the organizational culture.
• Establish and communicate function and individual KRAs/ KPIs, goals, action plan, expectations and resultsto reporting line.
• Manage function performance & provide feedback regularly (following the annual performance managementcycle).
• Define team’s capability requirements and enable team member’s professional and personal developmentthrough capability assessment, training, coaching & feedback, mentoring, etc.
• Motivate and recognize team members’ contributions towards the team’s shared goals.
• Responsible for talent development at the unit.
• Act as a role model and promote corporate culture at function level.
• Understand & communicate relevant HR offerings to team members
Job Requirements:
Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree or MBA in Economics; Bank; Customer segments or related fields.
• English Level: According to the Bank's regulations.

Professional Experience:
• 12+ years of experience in customer value management, financial management, or a related field, preferably within the retail banking sector.
• Have at least 6 years of management experience in a professional field or equivalent industry.
• Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret complex data and translate it into actionable strategies.
• Experience in building a management reporting system to track performance indicators related to customers.
• Have the knowledge to read and analyze reports on market research, understand the competitor market.
• Proficiency in CRM software, data analytics platforms, and other customer value management technologies.Experience in designing customer retention management frameworks, building customer retention programsand campaigns for each segment based on CVP to optimize customer lifecycle value.
• Experience in project management and change management according to the customer journey.

Title: Senior Expert, Business Marketing (Digital MKT)
Location: Techcombank HO, số 6 Quang Trung, Hoàn Kiếm, Hà Nội, Head Office: 6 Quang Trung Street, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi
Job Description:
The job holder take responsibility for the activities of bussiness marketing of division, including:
1. Business Marketing Planning
2. Design of MKT content for Program/ Campaign
3. Marketing campaign management (i.e. above the line marketing – HO directly communicates with customer;direct marketing; below the line are those campaign communicated 4 Marketing performance management
4. Marketing performance management

Key Accountabilities
1. Business Marketing Planning
- Develop and embed overall marketing calendar (including GTS, insurance) detailing marketing activities andlinking each campaign to strategy (i.e. acquisition, retention, deepening) by economic segment, economicsectors/activities, customer groups
- Manage execution of marketing activities, budget, premium / stocks and provide monthly update
- Co-ordinate with related parties to build communication proposition and creation of perception for products,solutions, aligned with brand name and target customer insight
- Drive preparation and implementation of NPS survey
2. Design of MKT content for Program/ Campaign
- Design content for marketing program, campaign
- Co-ordinate with related internal and external parties (e.g. agencies) to design content for marketing program,campaign
3. Marketing campaign management (i.e. above the line marketing – HO directly communicates with customer;direct marketing; below the line are those campaign communicated via sales channel)
- Develop, embed and manage campaign management mechanism including standard campaign specification,campaign proposal, campaign fulfilment process and documentation
- Strengthen public awareness and branding through collaboration with bank-wide Marketing team for marathon,above the line media, social media, strategic sponsorships, etc. (if any)
- Strengthen collaboration with Central Marketing team to leverage on resources for common campaign (e.g.TET premiums, Mid-autumn festival gifts, etc. if any)
4. Marketing performance management
- Develop KPIs and approach for assessment of marketing value
- Monitor marketing programs and campaign performance / fulfilment
Job Requirements:
Qualification and Experiences
- Bachelor's degree in Economics / Finance / Banking / Marketing / Business Administration
- Priority to have a master's degree or higher
- Minimum 12 years in the position related to financial analysis / credit / market research, marketing of finance and banking
- Prioritize work experience related to corporate customers
- Minimum TOEIC 650 or equivalent

Title: NPI Engineer ( Kỹ Sư Phát Triển Sản Phẩm Mới )
Company: Công Ty TNHH CCL Design Việt Nam
Location: KCN Đại An, P. Tứ Minh, TP. Hải Dương, tỉnh Hải Dương, Hà Nội, Vietnam, Bắc Ninh, Vietnam, Lô XN 25-1, KCN Đại An, P. Tứ Minh, TP. Hải Dương, Tỉnh Hải Dương
Job Description:
1. Purpose of position
To ensures efficient product development by managing cross-functional teams, optimizing processes, and ensuring quality standards. This role drives the successful introduction of new products, from design to production, while reducing costs and improving efficiency.

2. Main Responsibility
- Product Development: Work with cross-functional teams to develop new printing products/processes that meet customer requirements and manufacturing capabilities.
- Project Management: Create project plans, set timelines, and manage resources to ensure timely completion of NPI projects.
- Technical Expertise: Possess in-depth knowledge of printing technologies and stay updated on industry trends to recommend innovative solutions.
- Prototype Creation and Testing: Coordinate prototype development and testing to evaluate performance, quality, and feasibility.
- Process Optimization: Identify opportunities for process improvements and cost reduction during the NPI phase.
- Quality Assurance: Implement quality control processes, conduct inspections, and ensure compliance with standards and customer specifications.
- Supplier Management: Manage relationships with suppliers to source materials, equipment, and services for NPI projects.
- Documentation and Reporting: Prepare detailed documentation, project reports, and maintain accurate records of milestones and outcomes.
- Continuous Improvement: Identify areas for improvement in NPI processes and implement corrective actions.
- Collaboration and Communication: Ensure effective collaboration with cross-functional teams to align objectives and timelines throughout the NPI process

3. Scope/Measurement of Performance
- Site Conversion Rates: 20%
- KPI for Core Responsibilities: 70%
- Other Assignments from Manager: 10%

Working location: Lot XN6-II, Dai An IZ Expansion, Lai Cach town, Cam Giang district, Hai Duong province.
Job Requirements:
Education & Training:
- Bachelor’s/Master’s Degree in Engineering, Printing Technology, or a related field.
- Strong technical knowledge in the implementation of new printing products or processes.

Experience & Competency:
- Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Printing Technology, or a related field.
- Strong knowledge of printing processes, equipment, and materials.
- Experience in project management and new product introduction.
- Proficiency in CAD/AI software and design tools.
- Excellent problem-solving and analytical abilities.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- High attention to detail and commitment to quality.
- Ability to work effectively in cross-functional teams.
- Proficiency in Chinese is a plus.

QUYỀN LỢI:
• Attractive salary and performance-based bonus scheme.
• Holiday and year-end bonuses.
• Company-provided laptop (worth $1,500).
• Full Social Insurance + 24/7 Health Insurance + Annual health check-ups.
• Annual company trip & team-building events.
• Opportunities for overseas training and professional development.
• Standard working hours: Monday to Friday.
Keyword: Công Ty TNHH CCL Design Việt Nam

Title: International Sales Executive / Export Sales
Location: Số 52, Đường số 10, KDC Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, Quận 7, Hồ Chí Minh, 52 đường số 10, KDC Him Lam, Phường Tân Hưng, Quận 7, TP.HCM
Job Description:
OBJECTIVE
This position is responsible for sourcing and develop potential customers/clients efficiency.
Providing specific direction within rice industry, businesses, or organizations that might have a need for products or services offered by the company.
Follow up procedures, cost and work with another department deadline commitment
DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITY

Business development

Researching, planning, and implementing new target market initiatives
Prospect, build, and develop strategic partnerships with clients/customers
Maintain and grow existing business while securing new revenue streams from new clients
Organize international exhibitions, if any
Work with marketing team to update marketing tools and communicate on social networks
Sale development

Deal to Customer for increasing sale volume.
Consumer and Customer focus – must be externally focused on the changing needs of the Customer and consumer markets in Oversea
To responsible for sale target by monthly, quarter, 6 months and yearly of team
Usually update the change of PO (if any) with other departments and check PO documents. Follow up the delivery (quality & quantity) to Customers and checking lable, date information
Work with Supply chain about PO, shipment booking, client’s requirement. Control the sale risk and sale cost
Handle export process: negotiation, logistic, payments, etc
Customer care

Planning sales forecast in details for all key account to ensure supply accuracy. Update the price list and Key account list monthly
Research and analyze market trends, identify areas to expand to create strategic relationships with key customers
Follow-up suggest projects with quality department
Debt management

Working with Accounting team to update accuracy information of debt amount Customer. Control debt of cost and debt risk
Responsible for debt payment of Customer and improve the debt efficiency to limit risk
Responsible for reviewing the finance competence, reputation of Customer before sign contract and supervision the payment schedule of Customer
Brand development

Strategic management for the global brand of Lotus Rice develop key customers
Monitoring category and brands performance against market, evaluating the effectiveness of promotions, activities, and takes corrective action, as needed to ensure achievement of business goals of company
Job Requirements:
Attitude
Positive thinking
Learning passion
Teamwork
Working ethic
Continuous improvement and speed & simplicity mindset
Strong action and results oriented
Education

Vietnamese or Foreigner with Diploma or University Degree.
This position must speak, listen and write English in fluent
Good knowledge of export procedure
Excellence in regression analysis, logic, statistics, data skill
Good working knowledge of MS Office, SAP
Experience in

Experience in International/export Sales
Experience at least 2-5 years up
Experience in Agricultural, F&B, FMCG industry or any
Experience in oversea exhibition (if any)
Work independently and under high pressure
Skills

Good organization & planning skill
Good interpersonal/intercultural skills
Strong project management
Global thinking and international sale
Professional service skill
Strong communication, negotiation
Conceptual thinking, but strong action and results oriented
Deliver short term result in a long terms perspective
Benefits

Salary: Negotiation
13th salary month
Extra bonus
Commission bonus (according to policy) monthly
Best seller bonus
Best Supervisor bonus
Teambuilding (Trikking)
24/24 insurance for 2 first years and Bao Viet insurance & life insurance (2 years up)
Free lunch, gifts,
Yoga
Tennis
Location: District 07, Ho Chi Minh City (business sometime)

Direct supervisor: Manager

Working time: Monday to Friday: from 08:00am – 17:00pm (Saturday: from 08:00am – 12:00am)

Title: Partnership Manager
Company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Vàng Bạc Đá Quý Phú Nhuận (PNJ)
Location: 643 Dien Bien Phu, Ward 25, Binh Thanh District, 170E Phan Đăng Lưu, Phường 03, Quận Phú Nhuận, Tp. Hồ Chí Minh
Job Description:
The Partnership Manager is responsible for overseeing both tangible and intangible aspects of partnership management at PNJ. This includes leading teams in managing payment and non-payment partners, building relationships with high-level partners, and organizing VIP events. The role requires strategic vision, leadership skills, and the ability to cultivate strong partnerships that align with PNJ’s objectives.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Team Leadership:
• Lead and manage the partnership team, which is divided into two key areas:
+ Payment and Non-Payment Partners: Supervise the team responsible for maintaining and expanding relationships with both payment and non-payment partners.
+ Intangible Relations: Manage guest relations and event management, ensuring successful engagement with high-class partners and the organization of VIP events.
• Provide guidance and support to team members to ensure the effective execution of strategies and initiatives.
2. Partnership Strategy Development:
• Develop and implement partnership strategies that align with PNJ’s long-term business objectives.
• Identify and pursue new partnership opportunities to drive growth and increase value for the company.
• Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to negotiate partnership terms and secure mutually beneficial agreements.
Job description
The Partnership Manager is responsible for overseeing both tangible and intangible aspects of partnership management at PNJ. This includes leading teams in managing payment and non-payment partners, building relationships with high-level partners, and organizing VIP events. The role requires strategic vision, leadership skills, and the ability to cultivate strong partnerships that align with PNJ’s objectives.



Key Responsibilities:



1. Team Leadership:

• Lead and manage the partnership team, which is divided into two key areas:

+ Payment and Non-Payment Partners: Supervise the team responsible for maintaining and expanding relationships with both payment and non-payment partners.

+ Intangible Relations: Manage guest relations and event management, ensuring successful engagement with high-class partners and the organization of VIP events.

• Provide guidance and support to team members to ensure the effective execution of strategies and initiatives.

2. Partnership Strategy Development:

• Develop and implement partnership strategies that align with PNJ’s long-term business objectives.

• Identify and pursue new partnership opportunities to drive growth and increase value for the company.

• Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to negotiate partnership terms and secure mutually beneficial agreements.

3. Guest Relations:

• Establish and maintain relationships with high-class partners, fostering long-term collaboration and trust.

• Organize and participate in high-profile networking events to enhance PNJ’s reputation and strengthen key partnerships.

4. Event Management:

• Oversee the planning and execution of VIP events and engagements with high-class partners, ensuring a seamless experience that reflects PNJ’s brand and values.

• Collaborate with external vendors, venues, and stakeholders to ensure the success of these events.

5. Performance Tracking and KPIs:

• Set and monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) for both payment/non-payment partnerships and intangible relations.

• Regularly assess partnership performance and make data-driven decisions to optimize outcomes.
Job Requirements:
• Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
• Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience in partnership management, business development, or related fields, with at least 5 years in a leadership role.
• Skills:
• Strong leadership and team management skills.
• Excellent communication, negotiation, and relationship-building abilities.
• Proven ability to manage complex partnerships and deliver results.
• Strategic thinker with a customer-centric approach.
• Event planning and management experience is a plus.

- Tìm kiếm khách hàng mới và thiết lập mối quan hệ với khách hàng tiềm năng, mở rộng hệ thống khách hàng trong nước.
- Nắm bắt nhanh các thay đổi của thị trường và nhu cầu của khách hàng đối với các sản phẩm bao bì

- Có kinh nghiệm tại vị trí tương đương và phụ trách kinh doanh các sản phẩm bao bì hoặc các sản phẩm tương tự.
- Có khả năng thuyết phục và đàm phán khách hàng tốt.
- Có khả năng chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.

Title: [HCM] Financial Planning & Analysis Manager
Location: 253 Hoang Van Thu, TTC Building, Ward 2, Tan Binh District, Ho Chi Minh City
Job Description:
• You will take the lead on all planning, forecasting, analysis and reporting for the Group with significant exposure to the CEO, CFO, Board and Investors. You ability to communicate effectively with these stakeholders will be critical to your success
• Lead budgeting, profit and loss and cash flow forecasting, reporting and analysis for all functional areas of the business on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis.
• Drive and prepare all monthly, quarterly and annual management and investor related reports and presentations including the quarterly Board presentation.
• Compare historical results against budgets and forecasts, and perform variance analysis to explain differences in performance and model recalibrations as necessary
• Perform regular evaluations on whether the Group’s current assets and investments are the best use of the Group’s excess working capital by looking at return on investment (ROI) and suggest improvements on cash flow utilization.
• Identify and drive process improvements within the FP&A environment, including the creation and review of standard and ad-hoc reports and system and tool improvements.
Job Requirements:
• Minimum of 8-10 years of finance-related experience, with a strong focus on financial planning and analysis within a fast-paced MNC and/or in a related industry.
• Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, Data Science. Relevant professional qualifications (e.g. CMA/CFA/MBA) is a plus.
• Strong Excel/Google Sheets/Google Slides skills with a deep understanding of model architecture and formula efficiencies.
• Strong proficiency in spoken and written English.
• Excellent analytical, technical, financial modeling and presentation skills.
• Excellent distillation and synthesis of information.
• Self-directed, hands-on, motivated with a high degree of commitment to meeting deadlines, targets and objectives.
• Self-motivated, strong problem-solving skills, able to communicate and collaborate effectively with a wide range of stakeholders.
• Team player with an ability to function effectively in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

Bao gồm các chức năng: sàn trực tiếp, phát triển sàn đại lý, hỗ trợ kinh doanh, chăm sóc khách hàng; Khai thác và thẩm định dự án; Cung ứng các gói dịch vụ phát triển dự án cho Chủ đầu tư; Khai thác và đóng gói sản phẩm dự án kinh doanh; Nghiên cứu thị trường; Tổng thể các chức năng của truyền thông tiếp thị, quản trị thương hiệu hệ thống…
• Xây dựng chính sách bán hàng, chính sách hoa hồng, chính sách khen thưởng, chiến dịch truyền thông tiếp thị, kênh phân phối, đối tác,.. khi triển khai kinh doanh tiếp thị dự án.
• Phát triển các kênh phân phối bán hàng kỹ thuật số theo xu hướng thị trường.
• Tham mưu xây dựng chính sách thu nhập, khen thưởng dành cho khối kinh doanh tiếp thị.
• Phát triển phần mềm quản lý bán hàng marketing CRM.
Job Requirements:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học ngành Bất động sản, Tài chính, Kinh tế, Quản trị kinh doanh hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan.
- Trên 5 năm kinh nghiệm vị trí tương đương và trên 10 năm kinh nghiệm trong ngành bất động sản.
- Ứng viên từ 35 tuổi, ngoại hình sáng.
- Anh ngữ/ Tin học văn phòng
- Sử dụng các công cụ AI
- Am hiểu về thị trường BĐS tại Việt Nam.
- Có kinh nghiệm triển khai kinh doanh tiếp thị tổng thể cho các dự án BĐS quy mô lớn.
- Am hiểu các chính sách/quy định pháp luật hiện hành liên quan đến lĩnh vực kinh doanh bất động sản, nhà ở…
- Năng lực hoạch định chiến lược, quản trị tổng thể.
- Mạnh về kỹ năng đàm phán, thương lượng, giao tiếp tốt và ra quyết định.
- Mối quan hệ sâu rộng với các chủ đầu tư, chủ đất,…
- Có mối quan hệ với các doanh nghiệp/ cơ quan/ tổ chức trong ngành.
- Kỹ năng quản lý tốt.
Level: Giám Đốc và Cấp Cao Hơn
Keyword: Công Ty Cổ Phần Dịch Vụ Bất Động Sản Đất Xanh

- Thiết kế công đoạn, thực hiện Validation/ Kiểm chứng cho sản phẩm, máy móc, công đoạn.

Title: Nhân Viên Kinh Doanh - Premix
Location: Đà Nẵng, Nghệ An, Việt Nam, Cần Thơ, Ninh Kiều, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam, Tầng 12B, tòa nhà Sofic, số 10, đường Mai Chí Thọ, phường Thủ Thiêm, TP. Thủ Đức, TP.HCM
Job Description:
A. MỤC ĐÍCH CÔNG VIỆC:
- Giữ vai trò quan trọng trong mối quan hệ giữa các nhà phân phối, các đại lý, nông dân…nhằm gia tăng nhận diện và sử dụng sản phẩm công ty De Heus trong những khu vực địa lý được chỉ định theo chiến lược.
- Chịu trách nhiệm cho tất cả các hoạt động kinh doanh trong ngành hàng và khu vực nhằm đạt được chỉ tiêu khối lượng bán hàng hàng năm.
- Quản lý chất lượng và sự thống nhất của sản phẩm và dịch vụ bán ra.

B. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
- Tiếp thị và bán sản phẩm, dịch vụ của De Heus và mở rộng kinh doanh ra các vùng miền được giao.
- Chuẩn bị kế hoạch hành động và lên lịch trình nhằm nhận dạng những mục tiêu cụ thể và dự kiến số lượng các địa chỉ liên lạc với khách hàng (nhà phân phối, đại lý, nông dân…) sẽ làm.
- Xác định khách hàng tiềm năng và đạt chỉ tiêu kinh doanh, doanh số bán và số lượng khách hàng như được phân bổ.
- Chuẩn bị báo cáo về tình hình hoạt động kinh doanh, thanh lý, theo sát và tuân thủ các mục tiêu.
- Phát triển và thực hiện những hoạt động bán hàng đặt biệt nhằm giảm hàng tồn kho theo chiến lược kinh doanh đặt ra bởi - - - Giám sát kinh doanh vùng và Giám đốc kinh doanh.
- Điều phối lịch trình vận chuyển và giao nhận hàng hoá, phương tiện bán hàng và dịch vụ cho khách hàng.
- Hỗ trợ triển khai các kế hoạch marketing của công ty khi cần.
- Phối hợp giải quyết than phiền của khách hàng. Đưa ra hướng giải quyết mang tính xây dựng tất cả các than phiền của khác hàng liên quan trong khu vực quản lý.
- Hỗ trợ Giám sát kinh doanh thu thập và phân tích các thông tin trên thị trường bao gồm cả đối phương và sản phẩm của họ.
- Tiến hành xúc tiến khuyến mãi, ưu đãi, và các hoạt động chiến lược khác theo yêu cầu cho thị trường được sự tán thành của quản lý trực tiếp.
- Phản hồi những tiêu chí liên quan đến chất lượng và sự ổn định của sản phẩm trong vùng phụ trách.

C. KẾT QUẢ MONG ĐỢI:
- Thành công trong việc phát triển kinh doanh.
- Xây dựng chiến lược sản phẩm hợp lý.
- Khách hàng hài lòng với sản phẩm và dịch vụ của công ty.
Job Requirements:
TRÌNH ĐỘ:

KINH NGHIỆM:

- Định hướng dịch vụ khách hàng.

NĂNG LỰC:

- Có khả năng chịu được áp lực cao và hoàn thành công việc đúng hạn.
- Kỹ năng giao tiếp và truền đạt xuất sắc, cả nói và viết
- Có khả năng thuyết phục và ảnh hưởng người khác, thuyết trình
- Có khả năng tạo lập, tổng hợp và sửa chữa tài liệu viết.
- Hiểu biết về kỹ thuật bán hàng và tiếp thị quảng cáo

Title: Nhân Viên Khai Báo Hải Quan
Company: Công Ty CP Giao Nhận Vận Tải Ngoại Thương ( VNT Logistics)
Location: Số 2 Bích Câu, Hà Nội, Số 2 Bích Câu, Phường Quốc Tử Giám, Quận Đống Đa, Hà Nội
Job Description:
• Mở file theo dõi lô hàng, tiếp nhận thông tin của sales/khách hàng và phản hồi khi nhận được thông tin.
• Nhận bộ chứng từ của khách hàng qua email, tiến hành kiểm tra các thông tin trên bộ chứng từ nhập khẩu bao gồm PO, Sale Contract, Invoice, Packing List, Surendered/Telex Release BL, CO, CA, MSDS, giấy phép…đã đúng, đủ và khớp nhau.
• Theo dõi, kiểm tra cùng với khách hàng/sales, các bên Hãng tàu/ Forwarder để nhận được thông báo hàng đến với hàng nhập để có thông tin lên tờ khai không làm ảnh hưởng đến tiến độ làm hàng trong trường hợp có một bên bị chậm trễ.
• Truyền hải quan điện tử, thông báo nộp thuế, gửi các thông tin nộp thuế cho khách hàng/sales. Làm giấy nộp thuế/lệ phí hải quan gửi kèm vào tờ khai chính thức cho khách hàng/sales nếu có yêu cầu.
• Thông báo và nhận bộ hồ sơ gốc khách hàng gửi xác nhận lại tính đầy đủ, chính xác của bộ chứng từ, yêu cầu chỉnh sửa (nếu cần). Lưu lại bản copy các chứng từ vào file.
• Tiến hành sắp xếp chuẩn bị hồ sơ chuyển cho ops làm hàng.
• Theo dõi việc nộp thuế, tình hình làm thủ tục hải quan của OPS hiện trường và cập nhật thông tin cho khách hàng/sales.
• Xác nhận lịch giao hàng và phối hợp với bộ phận điều xe bố trí xe vận chuyển giao tại kho khách hàng.
Job Requirements:

QUYỀN LỢI:

• Lao động nữ trong thời gian nghỉ thai sản ngoài chế độ theo quy định của Nhà nước còn được hưởng trợ cấp hàng tháng của công ty.
• Được làm trong công ty lớn , có uy tín, lâu đời trong ngành.
• Được tham gia bảo hiểm cấp cao theo quy chế Công ty
• Được đi nghỉ mát định kỳ hàng năm, du lịch nước ngoài: châu Á hoặc Châu Âu theo quy chế công ty
• Được đạo tạo thường xuyên, nâng cao kiến thức về sản phẩm và kỹ năng bán hàng
• Được làm trong môi trường năng động và thoải mái
• Được hưởng mọi chế độ phúc lợi đầy đủ theo quy định của Bộ Luật lao động Việt Nam và quy định của Công ty.

Title: IT/OT & Cloud Security Solutions Architect
Location: Văn phòng Đại Diện (VPĐD) Công Ty TNHH De Heus, Tầng 12B, tòa nhà Sofic, số 10, đường Mai Chí Thọ, phường Thủ Thiêm, TP. Thủ Đức, TP.HCM
Job Description:
A. REPORT TO: Group Security Manager (CISO)

B. JOB PURPOSE:

- The IT/OT & Cloud Security Solutions Architect will play a pivotal role in designing, ensuring implementation, and verifying robust security solutions across our IT, OT, and Cloud environments. Additionally, this role will encompass responsibilities for OT security, ensuring secure integration and segregation between IT systems and OT environments. This position demands a deep understanding of cybersecurity principles, architectural frameworks, and best practices. Furthermore, the role will actively participate in security-related projects as a Subject Matter Expert (SME), providing specialized knowledge and guidance to ensure project success.

C. ACCOUNTABILITIES:
1. Define, Enforce, and Verify

- Develop and enforce standardized security standards and baselines across IT, OT, and Cloud environments.
- Ensure compliance with industry security standards and regulations.
- Ensure consistency in security practices through comprehensive documentation and adherence to established standards and baselines.
- Verify the implementation of security measures to ensure compliance with the defined standards and baselines by performing regular security assessments and audits.

2. Standardization
- Collaborate closely with the Cloud & Infra team, ensuring that security solutions are designed according to the established standards and baselines.
- Define security hardening measures for all IT, OT, and Cloud systems to mitigate vulnerabilities and reduce attack surfaces.
Conduct regular security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with hardening guidelines.

3. Continuous Monitoring and SOC Integration
- Connect required log sources to the SOC for continuous monitoring.
- Ensure the proper application of SOC use cases to maintain situational awareness and proactive security posture.
- Perform firewall rule reviews and other security configurations to support advanced threat detection and mitigation.
- Provide periodic (and eventually realtime) operational outcome-driven security metrics, to be included in our security dashboard.

4. Segregation between IT & OT
- Design and implement network segmentation strategies to securely separate IT and OT environments.
- Ensure secure data exchange between IT and OT systems while preventing cyber threats from spreading across environments.

5. Security Architecture
- Develop a global security architecture and solutions that include IT, OT, and Cloud systems and solutions while ensuring efficient integration and operations in cooperation with the Cloud & Infra team.
- Lead efforts to standardize security practices across the organization, leveraging the latest technologies and methodologies.
- Stay up-to-date with the latest security systems, standards, authentication protocols, and products.

6. Subject Matter Expert (SME) in Security-Related Projects
- Participate in security-related projects as a Subject Matter Expert, providing specialized knowledge and guidance to ensure project success.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements, objectives, and deliverables.
- Provide expertise in risk assessment, mitigation strategies, and security solutions design.
- Ensure that security measures are appropriately integrated into project plans and execution.

D. EXPECTED RESULTS:
- Standardized and compliant security measures are consistently defined, enforced, and verified across all IT, OT, and Cloud environments
- Security solutions are designed according to established standards and baselines, with effective hardening measures implemented across all systems
- All required log sources are integrated with the SOC, enabling proactive threat detection and the provision of actionable security metrics
- Secure network segmentation strategies are designed and implemented to prevent cyber threats from spreading between IT and OT environments.
- A global, integrated security architecture for IT, OT, and Cloud systems is developed, leveraging the latest technologies and ensuring efficient operations.
- Specialized security knowledge and guidance are provided to ensure successful project outcomes, risk mitigation, and integrated security measures.
Job Requirements:
Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field. Master's degree preferred.

Experience
- Minimum of 8 years of experience in cybersecurity, with a focus on IT, OT, and Cloud security architecture.
- Extensive knowledge of cybersecurity frameworks, including NIST and ISO27001.
- Understanding of network segmentation and segregation principles, particularly in IT environments.
- Proficiency in developing security standards and baselines for infrastructure, cloud, applications, and data.
- Proficiency in security hardening techniques and continuous monitoring tools.
- Relevant certifications such as CISSP, CISM, or CCSP are highly desirable.
- Understanding of OT systems is a plus, as a similar OT role will be created later.

Competencies
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess complex security scenarios and develop effective solutions.
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

Language(s)
- Fluency in English, both speaking and writing, as communication with teams across our global organization is required.

Other Requirements
- Full-time position based at any Global hub location, such as Asia or Africa.
- Occasional travel may be required for collaboration with global IT teams and participation in security conferences and workshops.

Title: Security Awareness Coordinator
Location: SOFIC Tower, Đường Mai Chí Thọ, Thủ Thiêm, Thành phố Thủ Đức, Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh, Việt Nam, Tầng 12B, tòa nhà Sofic, số 10, đường Mai Chí Thọ, phường Thủ Thiêm, TP. Thủ Đức, TP.HCM
Job Description:
A. REPORT TO: Group Security Manager (CISO)

B. JOB PURPOSE:

- The Security Awareness Coordinator will play a crucial role in managing security awareness programs tailored specifically to De Heus. This position requires effective communication and organizational skills, with a focus on collaborating with our awareness provider to ensure all training is relevant and applicable. The coordinator will ensure that all security training is accessible to employees, including making information available externally on our intranet. This role involves extensive collaboration with IT, communications teams, compliance and privacy stakeholders in all local business units (BUs), as well as with local HR/Learning stakeholders to ensure effective delivery and completion of training.

C. ACCOUNTABILITIES:

1. Training Content
- Propose and review security training content to ensure relevance and accuracy.
- Ensure close collaboration with the security team, compliance, and privacy stakeholders.
- Collaborate with our awareness provider to tailor content to De Heus's specific needs.

2. Train-The-Trainer Programs
- Propose and review content for offline training intended for non-office staff.
- Ensure training programs are provided in all locations in close collaboration with HR/Learning.

3. Stakeholder Collaboration
- Contact and coordinate with the correct stakeholders to ensure clarity and alignment.
- Collaborate with IT, communications teams, compliance, and privacy stakeholders in all local BUs to ensure that training aligns with business needs and standards.
- Work closely with local HR/Learning stakeholders for effective training delivery and completion.
- Collaborate with stakeholders across the organization to promote security awareness and best practices

4.Communication and Phishing Exercises
- Ensure all local BUs know what communication materials are available from the awareness provider.
- Coordinate the delivery of communication materials in an open format for local BU translation where required.
- Ensure phishing exercises are conducted and that all employees participate.

5. Reporting and Knowledge Management
- Develop and maintain reports on the effectiveness of security awareness programs.
- Ensure that all training content is available internally, outside of the learning platform, for easy access by all users, including on the intranet.
- Ensure that all personnel, including new starters, complete mandatory security training.

6. Collaboration with Security Team
- Work closely with the security team to ensure that all guidance in the training is feasible and practical.
- Collaborate with compliance and privacy stakeholders to review and approve training content for legal and compliance aspects.

7. Training Content Translation
- Ensure that training content, delivered in English, is thoroughly reviewed and approved by De Heus (e.g., CISO, Data Privacy Officer, and Compliance Manager).
- Coordinate the translation of approved training content into all local languages by our awareness provider.
- Check translated content with native language speakers in all BUs.
- Coordinate translated content for intranet use

D. EXPECTED RESULTS:
- Proposed and reviewed security training content ensures relevance and accuracy.
- Training content is tailored to De Heus's specific needs and aligned with legal and compliance aspects.
- Training content is proposed, thoroughly reviewed and delivered.
- Effectively coordinate with all relevant stakeholders to align training with business needs and ensure efficient delivery.
- Coordinate distribution of communication materials and conduct phishing exercises with full employee participation.
- Develop effectiveness reports,ensure all training content is easily accessible to all personnel, and that all personel completes the mandatory training.
- Effectively coordinate with all relevant stakeholders to guarantee feasible and practical training guidance, aligned with legal, compliance and security standards.
- Oversee the accurate translation and approval of training content into local languages for global use.
Job Requirements:
Qualifications
- Bachelor's degree in Information Security, Education, Communications, or a related field.

Experience
- Significant advantage for candidates with experience in security awareness, training, or a related field.

Competencies
- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
- Strong organizational and project management skills.

Language(s)
- Fluency in English, both speaking and writing, as communication with teams across our global organization is required.

Other Requirements
- Full-time position based at any Global hub location, such as Asia or Africa.
- Occasional travel may be required for collaboration with global IT teams and participation in security conferences and workshops.

Title: Quản Lý Trung Tâm Trải Nghiệm Giáo Dục [Upto 1800$]
Location: Tầng 3, TTTM Grand Plaza, 117 Trần Duy Hưng, P. Trung Hòa, Q. Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, Đường Kinh Dương Vương, Suối Hoa, Bắc Ninh, Việt Nam, Tầng 3, Grand Plaza, 117 Trần Duy Hưng, Trung Hòa, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội.
Job Description:
A. Quản lý Kinh doanh:

• Xây dựng chiến lược kinh doanh và kế hoạch bán hàng để đạt mục tiêu doanh số của trung tâm.

• Quản lý đội ngũ kinh doanh, điều phối và phân bổ chỉ tiêu bán hàng, hướng dẫn và đào tạo kỹ năng bán hàng cho nhân viên.

• Nghiên cứu thị trường, phân tích xu hướng, xác định đối thủ cạnh tranh, từ đó đưa ra giải pháp tăng cường năng lực cạnh tranh của trung tâm.

• Xây dựng và triển khai các chương trình khuyến mãi, sự kiện đặc biệt để thu hút khách hàng và tăng cường nhận diện thương hiệu.

B. Quản lý Hoạt động Trung tâm:

• Giám sát và đảm bảo các hoạt động trong trung tâm diễn ra hiệu quả, đúng quy trình và an toàn.

• Đảm bảo chất lượng trải nghiệm học tập cho trẻ em trong tất cả các phòng chức năng (phòng robotic, phòng thiên hà, phòng khoa học diệu kỳ, v.v.).

• Quản lý cơ sở vật chất, kiểm tra định kỳ các thiết bị công nghệ và dụng cụ học tập, đảm bảo chúng luôn trong trạng thái tốt nhất.

C. Phát triển Quan hệ Khách hàng:

• Tạo dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ lâu dài với khách hàng hiện tại và khách hàng tiềm năng, đặc biệt là các trường học và phụ huynh trong khu vực.

• Thu thập và xử lý ý kiến khách hàng, tìm hiểu nhu cầu của phụ huynh và học sinh để cải tiến chương trình và dịch vụ của trung tâm.

• Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ với các đối tác địa phương, từ đó mở rộng mạng lưới tiếp cận cho trung tâm.

D. Quản lý Nhân sự:

• Tuyển dụng, đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ nhân viên tại trung tâm, từ nhân viên tư vấn đến giáo viên hướng dẫn.

• Thiết lập và duy trì môi trường làm việc tích cực, khuyến khích sự sáng tạo và nhiệt huyết của nhân viên.

• Đánh giá và giám sát hiệu quả công việc của đội ngũ, đề xuất các biện pháp cải tiến khi cần thiết.
Job Requirements:
• Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp đại học, ưu tiên các ngành liên quan đến quản trị kinh doanh, marketing, giáo dục hoặc các lĩnh vực tương đương.

• Kinh nghiệm: Có ít nhất 3-5 năm ở vị trí tương đương hoặc đã có kinh nghiệm quản lý chi nhánh/ quản lý các trung tâm giáo dục.

• Kỹ năng:

- Kỹ năng quản lý đội nhóm, lãnh đạo và phát triển nhân viên.

- Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết phục và chăm sóc khách hàng.

- Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch và quản lý thời gian tốt, chịu được áp lực công việc cao.

• Kiến thức: Hiểu biết về thị trường giáo dục, đặc biệt là giáo dục STEAM là một lợi thế.

• Khả năng: Có khả năng sáng tạo, linh hoạt trong tư duy và thích ứng nhanh với môi trường làm việc.


Quyền lợi ứng viên
- Mức lương hấp dẫn từ 20,000,000 - 30,000,000 VNĐ/tháng dựa trên năng lực và kinh nghiệm.
- Các khoản thưởng dựa trên hiệu suất kinh doanh và doanh số của chi nhánh.
- Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng, cơ hội thăng tiến trong tập đoàn.
- Chương trình chăm sóc sức khỏe dành riêng cho cấp quản lý.

Title: R&D Manager
Company: Công Ty TNHH Premo Việt Nam
Location: Quảng Nam, Vietnam, Đà Nẵng, Việt Nam, Quảng Nam (giáp ranh Đà Nẵng), KCN Điện Nam - Điện Ngọc, Quảng Nam (Giáp ranh Đà Nẵng)
Job Description:
1. Definition of the job: A research and development (R&D) manager organizes a team of engineers to create new and refine existing products and technologies through a process of researching, designing, experimenting and testing. Their typical duties include: creating and developing new products to meet consumer needs.

2. What can employee experience and benefit from this position?: Every day something new! A wide variety of milling challenges for several products segments. Collaboration with international colleagues, working passionately at the development of new products and machining strategies for our worldwide customers. An organization that is small enough to have oversight and an informal atmosphere. The size of Premo offer you the possibilities to build an international career.

3. Position responsibilities:
3.1. Managing and organizing R&D team
- Manage and direct the research and development programs to meet organizational needs and to capitalize on potential new products.
- Develop and implement research and development procedures and techniques.
- Oversee complex research projects, analyzes results and provides recommendations based on findings. Assesses the scope of research projects and ensures they are on time and within budget.
- Manage/allocate R&D resource to leverage opportunity projects to get awarded and go to mass production successfully (on time and on cost).
- Monitor all projects progress in 'feasibility phase' to predict or take early actions/escalation to keep projects on track and unblock technical issues.
- Assist in the generation of technical proposals and cost estimates.
- Collaborate with product stakeholders to translate business problem statements into technical solutions.
- Leverage the latest technology. Know that technology has a solution for everything – right from efficient task management and simplified collaboration to effortless reporting and time tracking.
- Support/Resolve customer complaints to the full satisfaction of the customer regarding technical matters.
- Manage sample line, ensure samples to be on time for delivery. Review and optimize sample plan according to toolings, raw material, production process and manpower; understand Material Requirements Planning (MRP).
- Manage department's budget
- Inspire employees at every level. Inspiration comes at many levels; from boosting the morale of the team when things are not going right to talking it out with individuals when they are facing problems in their personal lives.
- Deploy company policies and guidelines to employees
3.2. Development of employees and performance evaluation
- Train and act as mentors to their employees and teach them skills that they can use as they advance their careers.
- Coordinate with associated departments to prepare the training plans aiming to enhance the skills of the employees and measuring their effectiveness.
- Advice seminars, workshops, and conferences based on each department’s needs
- Monitor the employee performance during the working time to ensure proper assessment of the weak/strong points of the employee is done - or whether disciplinary actions are needed -, contract revision and managing promotion/demotion.
- Coach employee under area of responsibility
- Follow up the job carried out by his team and detects blocking points or risks
- Define priorities according to situation, context and direction received from management
- Evaluate performance of staff under supervision
- Report timely to upper manager with clearly presented data
- Manage conflicts: including conflicts between members of their team or between teams
- Develop, motivate, and challenge team members with the aim to develop the team
Job Requirements:
1. Education: Bachelor Degree in Electrical-Electronics, Power Electronics or related fields.
2. Experience: At least 1 year in same position or 3-5 years in related positions
3. Specific Competencies & Knowledge:
- Engineering & Design: Electrical, Mechanical, Magnetism Design*, Power Electronics, Analog/Digital Electronics, Mechanical Modeling*, Electronic Simulation, Magnetic & Thermal Simulation
- Tools & Processes: SolidWorks/Onshape, PSIM/LTSpice/Simulink, Excel*, ANSYS/Maxwell/Icepack, DFMEA*, SAP*, SharePoint*
- Manufacturing Knowledge: Winding, Soldering, Assembling, Testing, Automation, Plastic & Metal Materials, LPM & HPM
- Quality & Project Management: Quality Systems (ISO), Costing, Project Integration, FMEA/Risk Analysis

Title: DevSecOps Engineer - Khối Công Nghệ Thông Tin (HO25.309)
Company: Ngân Hàng Thương Mại Cổ Phần Quân Đội - MB
Location: Quận Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội, 19th – MB Building,18 Le Van Luong Str., Cau Giay Dist. Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
Mô tả công việc
• Xây dựng và tối ưu hóa quy trình DevOps/DevSecOps, áp dụng nguyên tắc tự động hóa nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả triển khai ứng dụng công nghệ thông tin.
• Triển khai, vận hành và quản lý các giải pháp/công cụ CICD/IaC, công nghệ Containerization/Kubernetes như GitLab, Jenkins, Nexus, Docker, ISTIO, Ansible, Rancher, v.v.
• Đảm nhiệm các công việc triển khai (deploy), tối ưu hóa (optimizing), giám sát (monitoring), phân tích (analysis) sản phẩm.
• Tham gia ngay từ giai đoạn phát triển sản phẩm, thiết kế các thành phần phi chức năng nhằm đảm bảo an ninh hệ thống và hỗ trợ trong quá trình vận hành, bao gồm:
• Thiết kế hệ thống tuân thủ các chính sách và quy định bảo mật.
• Chuẩn hóa logging, tracing và thông tin monitoring, sử dụng các công cụ như ELK, Prometheus, Grafana.
Job Requirements:
• Tốt nghiệp đại học các chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, Toán tin, Điện tử Viễn thông, hoặc lĩnh vực liên quan.
• Vị trí mở với ứng viên mới tốt nghiệp có đam mê với lĩnh vực DevOps, DevSecOps.
• Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm thực tế về DevOps/DevSecOps tại công ty công nghệ hoặc tổ chức tài chính.
• Hiểu biết về quy trình phát triển phần mềm, quen thuộc với tư duy làm việc Agile.
• Có kiến thức về các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu, bao gồm Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, MongoDB…
• Kinh nghiệm xây dựng CI/CD Pipeline, sử dụng một trong số các công cụ sau: Jenkins, GitLab, Nexus, Harbor, Docker, Helm, Kubernetes, Prometheus, Grafana.
• Tiếng Anh tốt, có khả năng làm việc trực tiếp với đối tác nước ngoài.
